divs: Sighting DetailsWoke up @ 4:30 am, noticed an abnormal light through window and it was stationary. Knowing there was no tower, or other such lighted structure there, went outside with camera to investigate. There was no noise, thus it was'nt a helicopter. Took 3 pictures, and before I could take more, the BRAND NEW batteries in camera went dead. Watched for 10 minutes then it just disappeared.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Locust Grove
This sighting has never been favorited.
